reviews.review: This game is awesome really enjoy it but there are no many hackers! really love prime and those kind of things but I recommend removing free to play! it's toxic and every second person is hacking! A lot of my friends we're hacking in the game and I didn't know so I bought my prime and it looks like I wasted some money because I have a low trust factor now because of these asses that were hacking #notfreefromhackers
